article_title: Glenn Short: The long reach of Obamacare
article_text:
Glenn Short: The long reach of Obamacare

I was struck by the irony of Froma Harrop's Jan. 8 Commentary piece ("These long lines for service cannot be good for business"). In fact, that whole section of the paper was ironical.
